product_name: The North Face  Buckland Pants - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Made with heavyweight-but-soft cotton canvas, reinforced seams and extra rivets at the pocket corners, the rugged Buckland Pants from The North Face are designed for years of use and abuse.
short_description: Made with heavyweight-but-soft cotton canvas, reinforced seams and extra rivets at the pocket corners, the rugged Buckland Pants from The North Face are designed for years of use and abuse.
